name: Vegan Shea Butter Sea Salt Bar
description:
Relax, rejuvenate, and pamper yourself with a Shea Butter Sea Salt Bar! Made with naturally detoxifying sea salt, coconut oil for a creamy, lotion-like lather, moisturizing shea butter and castor oil. This soap will soothe your senses with the clean and fresh scent of White tea and Ginger and refresh your soul as it nourishes your skin! 

Salt bars perform best when used with a pouf or cloth. They are not scrubby, but polish your skin to a healthy glow. 

Care and Use:

Gently cleanses and moisturizes the skin. Rich creamy lather leaves skin soft and smooth. To extend the life of your handcrafted soap, place it in a well-draining soap dish. Keep unused bars in a cool, dark and dry location.

INGREDIENTS:
coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, safflower oil, glycerine, shea butter, sea salt, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate and soybean protein

name: Passionfruit Guava Goat's Milk Soap
description:
Passion Fruit & Guava fun and tantalizing that explodes with tropical scents! The fruity freshness of crisp lemon zest, Brazilian orange, and grapefruit mingle with sheer guava, sweet granadilla, and peach. The tart, sweet, and soft scent of passion fruit blended with musk and vanilla will awaken your senses.

Made with 10% refrigerated liquid Vitamin D Goat's Milk. Goat's milk is known for it's delicate moisturizing properties for dry or problem skin. These moisturizing properties soften and nourish the skin.

Care and Use:

Gently cleanses and moisturizes the skin. Rich creamy lather leaves skin soft and smooth. To extend the life of your handcrafted soap, place it in a well-draining soap dish. Keep unused bars in a cool, dark and dry location.

INGREDIENTS:
coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, safflower oil, glycerine, goats milk, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein and titanium dioxide

name: Aloe Vera Soap- VEGAN FRIENDLY
description:
Aloe Vera is known to have excellent healing properties that are soothing when applied to burns and abrasions. This soap is very gentle and cleansing to the skin. Makes a fun bar for summer time!

Care and Use:

Gently cleanses and moisturizes the skin. Rich creamy lather leaves skin soft and smooth. To extend the life of your handcrafted soap, place it in a well-draining soap dish. Keep unused bars in a cool, dark and dry location.

INGREDIENTS:
coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, safflower oil, glycerine, aloe vera gel, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate and soybean protein

name: Oatmeal Soap-VEGAN Friendly
description:
Our oatmeal soap is made with only the finest ingredients and is full of oats! 

Enjoy the benefits of oatmeal with this soothing bar of soap.Oatmeal soap is known to gently exfoliate the skin and also produces a great moisturizing lather.The benefits of oatmeal come from its ability to bind to the skin. Because of its affinity for water, it acts as a moisturizer by attracting and holding water on the skin's surface. In addition, protein components, such as cellulose and fiber, anchor moisturizers for long-lasting action. The result is softer, more elastic skin. This binding action also creates a barrier which protects the skin from harmful substances. In addition, the ground oatmeal acts as a soothing agent which helps reduce redness, itching and many minor skin irritations. 

Scented with the natural smell of Oatmeal! (no fragrance added)

Care and Use:

Gently cleanses and moisturizes the skin. Rich creamy lather leaves skin soft and smooth. To extend the life of your handcrafted soap, place it in a well-draining soap dish. Keep unused bars in a cool, dark and dry location.

INGREDIENTS:
coconut oil, palm oil, castor oil, safflower oil, glycerine, oatmeal, purified water, sodium hydroxide, sorbitol, sorbitan oleate, soybean protein and titanium dioxide
